message: Let's split the money 60/40.  A fair deal to start.
Your offer was a bit imbalanced. How about a 45/55 split?
I need a larger share to account for the rapid inflation. Let's do 65/35.
This inflation is hurting us both. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.
We're running out of time. I'll accept a smaller increase, but 60/40 is my bottom line.
We're halfway through and need to agree. 55/45 is my final offer.
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to meet you halfway. 55/45 it is, before this inflation eats all our profits!
